Posts.Content: Hello all. I'm from San Diego County and I was diagnosed with MBC after partial mastectomy on 12/23/05. I see my oncologist tomorrow for first visit and anxious to know his recommendations for assessment of possible spreading and future treatment. I'll add info as I get it to help in our cause to know more about MBC. Love to you all.
Posts.Title: Invasive Metaplastic Breat Carcinoma
